tasks.title: Setup Development Environment
tasks.description: Install necessary tools and configure the development environment for the new project

tasks.description: Create comprehensive database schema for user management and application data

tasks.description: Build reusable UI components for the dashboard and user interface

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Analyze and optimize application performance, focusing on database queries and API response times
